example.code:
PS C:\> Get-EC2ImportSnapshotTask
Description ImportTaskId SnapshotTaskDetail ----------------- -------------------- ------------------ Disk Image Import 1 import-snap-abcdefgh Amazon.EC2.Model.SnapshotTaskDetail Disk Image Import 2 import-snap-hgfedcba Amazon.EC2.Model.SnapshotTaskDetail
example.description: This example shows how to obtain details of all current snapshot import tasks and their status.

example.code:
PS C:\> Get-EC2ImportSnapshotTask -ImportTaskId import-snap-abcdefgh
Description ImportTaskId SnapshotTaskDetail ----------------- -------------------- ------------------ Disk Image Import 1 import-snap-abcdefgh Amazon.EC2.Model.SnapshotTaskDetail
example.description: This example shows how to obtain details of a specified snapshot import task.
